song.title: I Need Thee Every Hour
song.lyrics:
[1] I need thee every hour, most gracious Lord; no tender voice like thine can peace afford.
[C] Refrain: I need thee, O I need thee; every hour I need thee! O bless me now, my Savior, I come to thee.
[2] I need thee every hour, stay thou near by; temptations lose their power when thou art nigh. [B] [Refrain]
[3] I need thee every hour, in joy or pain; come quickly, and abide, or life is vain. [B] [Refrain]
[4] I need thee every hour; teach me thy will, and thy rich promises in me fulfill. [B] [Refrain]
